entry.summary: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by runoff from earlier heavy rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of northern West Virginia, including the following counties, Doddridge, Pleasants and Tyler. * WHEN...Until 900 AM EST Sunday.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 2:26AM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Strong Winds Likely tonight... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...West winds increasing to 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 50 mph. This will be mainly in the Absarokas and in the vicinity of Clark.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 2:26AM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Strong Winds Likely through Monday... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts to around 50 mph. Locally higher gusts are possible in wind prone areas, like along Wyoming Boulevard.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations

entry.title: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 02 at 1:13AM MST until January 02 at 8:00AM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...South central Wyoming, including portions of Carbon County and Albany County.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Central Carbon County; Shirley Basin; Southwest Carbon County

entry.title: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 02 at 1:13AM MST until January 02 at 11:00PM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Visibility lowering to under a half mile at times. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph in wind prone areas. Gusts to 40 mph in the Laramie Valley, including Laramie.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Laramie Valley; North Snowy Range Foothills; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
